programme.title: Dhamaal
programme.desc: Dhamaal is a madcap comedy about four lazy and broke friends who accidentally learn about a hidden treasure buried in Goa. What follows is a hilarious adventure filled with unexpected twists, car chases, and laugh-out-loud moments as they race against others to find the fortune. Directed by Indra Kumar, this film is known for its clean humor and slapstick fun, making it a cult classic in Indian comedy.

programme.title: Singh is King
programme.desc: Directed by Anees Bazmee, this action-comedy features Akshay Kumar as Happy Singh, whose journey from a village in Punjab to becoming a crime lord in Australia is filled with humor, action, and unexpected turns.

programme.title: Singh is King
programme.desc: Directed by Anees Bazmee, this action-comedy features Akshay Kumar as Happy Singh, whose journey from a village in Punjab to becoming a crime lord in Australia is filled with humor, action, and unexpected turns.

programme.title: Holiday - A Soldier is Never Off Duty
programme.desc: Directed by A. R. Murugadoss, this action thriller stars Akshay Kumar as Captain Virat Bakshi, who stumbles upon a sleeper cell network during his holiday. Balancing his personal life and duty, he works to prevent a major terrorist attack. The film is a Hindi remake of the Tamil movie Thuppakki.

programme.title: Dhamaal
programme.desc: Dhamaal is a madcap comedy about four lazy and broke friends who accidentally learn about a hidden treasure buried in Goa. What follows is a hilarious adventure filled with unexpected twists, car chases, and laugh-out-loud moments as they race against others to find the fortune. Directed by Indra Kumar, this film is known for its clean humor and slapstick fun, making it a cult classic in Indian comedy.

programme.title: Kismat Konnection
programme.desc: Directed by Aziz Mirza, this romantic comedy stars Shahid Kapoor as Raj Malhotra, an unsuccessful architect whose luck turns around after meeting Priya (Vidya Balan). As he starts attributing his success to her, complications arise, leading to a tale of love, destiny, and self-discovery.

programme.title: Awarapan
programme.desc: Directed by Mohit Suri, Awarapan stars Emraan Hashmi as a tormented hitman working for a crime lord. When he's assigned to monitor his boss's mistress, he begins to question his life choices, leading to a path of self-discovery and redemption. The film is an uncredited remake of the South Korean movie A Bittersweet Life.

programme.title: Jodi No.1
programme.desc: Directed by David Dhawan, this comedy features Sanjay Dutt and Govinda as Jai and Veeru, partners in crime who flee to Goa and impersonate rich businessmen. Their plan to marry into wealth backfires hilariously as they fall for the daughters of their target, leading to a series of misadventures.
